input_text:
Job Title: Warehouse Shipping Associate

Location: Blytheville, AR

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Looking to take the next step in your career? Staffmark is thrilled to announce an exciting opportunity for a Warehouse Shipping Associate in Blytheville, AR.

Pay Rate: $19.00 per hour

Shifts: 12-hour shifts

As a Warehouse Shipping Associate, you'll play a crucial role in the smooth operation of our warehouse. Responsibilities include tagging and scanning pipes, assisting drivers with loading and unloading, and ensuring accurate documentation. While previous manufacturing experience is preferred, we welcome applicants with a strong work ethic and a willingness to learn.

Qualifications:

Previous manufacturing experience preferredAbility to perform a full range of body movementsCapability to lift objects weighing up to 50 lbsStrong attention to detail and commitment to safety


But that's not all – we believe in recognizing your hard work and dedication. Enjoy weekly pay, access to medical, dental, and vision benefits, as well as a 401K plan to support your financial future. Plus, take advantage of employee discounts and referral bonus opportunities.

If you're ready to embark on a rewarding career journey with a supportive team by your side, don't hesitate – click "Apply Now" to get started! Our dedicated recruiter is eager to discuss this amazing opportunity with you.

After you have applied, download our Staffmark Group WorkNOW App to receive real-time job offers and apply for additional opportunities. You can download it from the App Store or get it on Google Play. 

About Staffmark

Staffmark is committed to providing equal employment opportunity for all persons regardless of race, color, religion (including religious dress and grooming practices), sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital status, national origin, ancestry, citizenship status, pregnancy, medical condition, genetic information, mental and physical disability, political affiliation, union membership, status as a parent, military or veteran status or other non-merit based factors. We will provide reasonable accommodations throughout the application, interviewing and employment process. If you require a reasonable accommodation, contact us. Staffmark is an E-Verify employer. This policy is applicable to all phases of the employment relationship, including hiring, transfers, promotions, training, terminations, working conditions, compensation, benefits, and other terms and conditions of employment.

All employees are directed to familiarize themselves with this policy and to act in accordance with it. All decisions with respect to employment matters and other phases of employer-temporary employee relationships will be in keeping with this policy and in accordance with all applicable laws and regulations.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Warehouse Shipping Associate
output_json.summary: Exciting opportunity for a Warehouse Shipping Associate in Blytheville, AR.
job_responsibilities: Assisting drivers with loading and unloading
